have you ever heard and perhaps then seen a hummingbird sing and fly its way through a flower garden
have you observed a squirrel digging flipping and flopping in the duff under a shady blue spruce
have you heard and seen pods of multi-aged dolphins frolicking and waters and surfing ocean waves
have you heard and seen how aspen leaves dance shimmer and whisper songs of joy
have you ever seen the bliss and serenity and snow monkeys macaques face as well soaking in the mountain hot springs of jigo kudani monkey park in japan
have you seen adolescent goats prants and flirt and dance and stumble as they imbibe the fermented fallen fruits
have you ever looked closely at honeybees arching their backs in apparent ecstasy
the utter uninhibited joy and love radiating from a baby's face when she opens her eyes to see her mother and father
can we possibly experience these things and not believe the earth to be an Eden of delights
